title: Balaam’s Final Blessings and Prophecy
summary: Numbers 24 contains Balaam’s final oracles. He again blesses Israel and prophesies future victories and a coming ruler who will rise from Jacob. Balak becomes furious, and Balaam departs.

faq.question: What did Balaam prophesy about Israel?
faq.answer: He saw a future king and foretold Israel’s conquest over other nations.

faq.question: How did Balak respond to Balaam’s final blessing?
faq.answer: He was angry and sent Balaam away without a reward.
